sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Create JavaScript Content Provider Rules</description>
        <name>Create JavaScript Content Provider Rules</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	// If zbooting, provider records default to deny and only maint has CRUD access
	// If upgrading, provider records default to allow and only admin has CRUD access
	var ad = new SNC.JavaScriptContentAccessDecider();
	ad.createSystemProperty();
	ad.setJqueryLegacyProperty();
	ad.createDefaultProviderRecords();
}());
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>andrew.kincaid</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-09 17:37:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>807634c377020110e4cd169bae5a99ca</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Create JavaScript Content Access Rules</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Static Content Serving" source="com.glide.ui.content">ff2378603c31311068bcf327dfe37fed</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_807634c377020110e4cd169bae5a99ca</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>andrew.kincaid</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-25 14:35:39</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
